abstract: Executive pay practices may have helped drive strong corporate performance, but what about the moral element?
snippet: Executive pay practices may have helped drive strong corporate performance, but what about the moral element?
lead_paragraph: “I really don’t want to answer that question,” said Ira T. Kay, flashing me some combination of half-grin and half-grimace. “I have clients.”

headline.main: What if C.E.O. Pay Is Fair?
headline.print_headline: What If C.E.O. Pay Is Fair?
